text: Need Blake Morgan for Mecca campaign. Budget around $10,295, looking for 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 3 x TV appearance, 3 x 10-minute unboxing, 3 x YouTube video, 3 x LinkedIn post. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
